title: Chace Crawford 'sworn to secrecy' over The Boys calendar bulge photo
text:
Chace has said it will ‘forever remain a mystery’ (Picture: Rex/Amazon Prime Video)

Chace Crawford has claimed that he has been ‘sworn to secrecy’ regarding the image of his supposed bulge on the official calendar photo for his hit series The Boys.

The actor stars in Amazon Prime’s superhero series as Kevin, aka The Deep, and one photo of him in particular featured in the show’s official calendar left everyone talking – as many eagle-eyed fans spotted what appeared to be his manhood sticking out.

Now Chace has stated that the image will remain a ‘mystery’, and has promised to keep the details under wraps.

‘There is a story behind that but I’m sworn to secrecy by Eric Kripke [showrunner],’ he told Entertainment Weekly.

‘I’m sworn to secrecy. I wish I could give you a good answer but we’ll never know.

‘It will forever remain a mystery. We will never know!’

He also stated that showrunner Eric ‘got a big kick out of it’, who thought it was ‘the funniest thing in the world’.

‘I thought it was so funny, but I don’t think anyone got a bigger kick out of it than Eric,’ he continued.

Fans had a lot to say about the particular picture featured in the calendar (Picture: Amazon Prime Video)

‘He thought it was the funniest thing in the world. Oh god. It was probably a little bit over covered but I was like, “Whatever The Deep can do for you guys to get some press, you know I’m ready to support the show!”

‘That was one I had to explain to a few people. I got a lot of weird DMs in my inbox.’

The 34–year-old later admitted that he had no idea what he was getting himself into as he took part in the shoot, and he realised that the calendar was only going to feature shots of his character.

‘I remember late in the season last year, we were doing a big Amazon promotional shoot. We were all there on set doing group shots.

‘They pulled me over to a green screen and told me, “We’re doing calendars.” I’m thinking, okay, everyone’s got a calendar. That’s great! But no. It was just me!’

Chace later recalled ‘grabbing props and doing silly stuff’ as he had his photos taken for the calendar while confessing he enjoyed the shoot, calling it ‘cheesy’ and ‘really funny’.

The Boys has become an instant hit, and it has become one of Amazon Prime’s most popular series following its premiere back in July.

Off of the back of the show’s success, it’s been renewed for a second season.

Season one of The Boys is available to stream on Amazon Prime.
